StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianTechTree_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tech tree focused on Research and Influence.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes manufacturing and research buildings cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianXeonMysticism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Social Matrix.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDarkEnergeyReseach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Dark Energy Lab.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianParadiseWorlds_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianInherentMagic_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases accuracy and interferes with enemy targeting.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianDefensiveMeditation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Champion's Temple.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of the Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings and freighters.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianMeditationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Meditation Centers.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPlanetaryRefection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of Communion Centers.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianSerenityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the Drathian Temple.

StringTable.Label: Return_AltarianPrecursorAntiquities_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the Precursor Reliquary.
